sentences.en: All the films on display were Hong Kong or domestically produced movies.
sentences.cn: 在过去影院放映的全都是港产片或国产电影.

sentences.en: Although such items are manufactured domestically, there is not enough local stock.
sentences.cn: 虽然台员有生产这几款产品﹐毋恪大部份拢提去外销, 临时欲做嘛袂赴.

sentences.en: Domestically company have to process exchange settlement when they get exchange earing.
sentences.cn: 国内单位取得以下的外汇收入的必须结汇,不能保留外汇.

sentences.en: Domestically, agricultural saving frequently occurs in kind.
sentences.cn: 从国内来说, 农业储蓄经常以实物形式出现.

sentences.en: Domestically, he's going to make some compromises that he doesn't want to make.
sentences.cn: 他打算在国内做些他不想做的让步。

sentences.en: Furthermore, all our domestically manufactured products are manufactured to various international standards.
sentences.cn: 此外, 我们所有的产品都是国内生产制造的各种国际标准.

sentences.en: Generally speaking, a complete variety of gold markets are available domestically.
sentences.cn: 但总体来看, 我国黄金市场类型还算基本全面.

sentences.en: I plan to change to a domestically made car.
Initial public offerings of domestically listed A shares can take months.
sentences.cn: 在国内A股上市的首次公开募股(IPO) 可能耗时数月.

sentences.en: Its domestically located businesses have annual revenue exceeding $ 1.2 billion.
sentences.cn: 中国国内的公司年销售额超过12亿美元.

sentences.en: Not only domestically, as you know, these may cause serious repercussions.
sentences.cn: 不只是国内的问题, 你们知道, 这会引起很严重的后果.

sentences.en: Opportunities will improve as the company expands domestically and internationally.
sentences.cn: 随着国内业务和国际业务的扩展，该公司将获得更好的机会。

sentences.en: Overall, what we want is to open up domestically and internationally.
The technology is the world's leading and an initiative domestically.
sentences.cn: 此技术属世界领先,国内首创.

sentences.en: There are cheerleaders with low self - esteem available domestically?
sentences.cn: 当缺乏 自尊 的啦啦队员们唾手可得时?
